faqs.question: Will you hate me if I don't come to the wedding?
faqs.answer: Not at all! We completely understand - it's not an easy trip. We'll miss you, but we'll still love you just the same ❤️

faqs.question: How do we RSVP?
faqs.answer: Please fill out our RSVP form to let us know if you're coming! Click here to RSVP

faqs.question: What should we expect from the food?
faqs.answer: There will be vegetarian food and non-alcoholic drinks for the meals during the wedding days.

faqs.question: Is there a dress code for the events?
How can I follow wedding planning updates and connect with other guests?
faqs.answer: Join our WhatsApp group to connect with other guests, coordinate travel plans, and stay updated with all wedding information! Click here to join
